index.about.title: About me
index.about.content: First of all I am passionate about programming. Every day I deal with the Webdev mostly using React, Laravel and Vue. In my free time I create open source projects on GitHub. In past I used to create graphics applications and games. One of my goals is to constantly learn about new technologies...
